attributes.additional_details: We need to stop all expense for Mp's. Politician would be able to make better decision if they felt the same hard ship as many of us in the UK. At present Mp's seem to spend no money whatsoever on life's essentials like petrol, housing, travel and food. Many reclaim what they spend on expenses leaving the public with the bill. Mp's would make better politician if they paid for everything out of they own pockets and the public would have a lot more respect and trust for them.
